DOC.brief_summary: Investigational device : AKITA 2 device versus conventional metered-dose inhaler ( MDI ) Objectives : To explore inhalative fluticasone application mean AKITA technology would result good symptom control patient severe persistent asthma compare inhalative application fluticasone conventional MDI . Study design : open label , cross-over ( one AKITA , one MDI arm ) Patients : 20 Patients severe persistent asthma
